value:
My brother and Soren don't look like
they're enjoying the festival much, do
they? Cheer up, you two!
Father... I've done my best. Ike, too.

There's something so nice about
giving presents to people. I wish
this festival would never end...

Huh? Who do I like? I...haven't
even thought about that yet!

I did my best to make sure everyone
else was dressed for the festival, so
Titania gifted me my dress.

Hello there! Do you like my dress?
On this Day of Devotion, don't forget
$Nf!

I see that someone understands
how I feel!

I want to let everyone
know my feelings.

Huh? Where is it? Where's the
present? Oh no!

I'll treasure the kindness
you've shown me.

Did I make it to the festival? My name
is Mist, and I want to let everyone
know how much they mean to me.

Love may not be something you can
see, but you can feel it. That warms
my heart.$k$pAnd if you want to give it a shape...
you can always give the ones you
love presents.$k$pEven if you're far away from someone
you care about, you can show them
you're thinking about them.$k$pFriends really are nice to have, aren't
they?$k$pBecause you've helped me so much,
I thought I could show you how I
really feel with a present.$k$pI hope you like it—I chose it just for
you. Let's never drift apart, OK?
えーいっ！
もう！
きゃああっ！
やだもう！
Here you go!
This one's for you!
These are my feelings!
I want...that one!
I've lost...
Well...
Are you feeling all right?
Are you wounded? Do you need a vulnerary?
What do I want? Oh, it's all right. You don't have to worry about me.
A mercenary group has a lot of expenses. That makes shopping for everyone pretty difficult...
Oh, this? It was a gift from Titania. It's my most treasured possession!
Father... I'll... I'll do everything I can!
I'm so glad you're here! I was just thinking about how I want to spend more time with you.
Sounds good.
Which one?
Hmm, tough call...
